invalidRange.message: Data fields must match the value range fields. Please note that texts are case-sensitive.

tooLong.message: Alphanumeric fields must be less than or equal to the strings length.

invalidDate.message: The date 11/9/23 does not match the NDA definition for Date fields which is MM/DD/YYYY. Leading zeroes are required for single digit day and month. Years must be between 1900-2200
